name: uploadArtifact
description: Uploads a cache artifact identified by the `hash` specified on the path. The cache artifact can then be downloaded with the provided `hash`.

x-artifact-duration.description: The time taken to generate the uploaded artifact in milliseconds.

x-artifact-client-ci.description: The continuous integration or delivery environment where this artifact was generated.

x-artifact-client-interactive.description: 1 if the client is an interactive shell. Otherwise 0

x-artifact-tag.description: The base64 encoded tag for this artifact. The value is sent back to clients when the artifact is downloaded as the header `x-artifact-tag`

teamId.description: The Team identifier or slug to perform the request on behalf of.
